entry.title: $2575 // NO FEE Long, spacious renovated 1 Bd/1 Ba w/dishwasher, large closets,
entry.content:
NO FEE! Long, spacious renovated 1 Bd/1 Ba w/ large closets access to gym/laundry

Price: $2,575
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Approx. Size: 704 Sq. Ft.
Floor: 4
Pets: Pets OK

Building Amenities

Brownstone
Concierge
Diplomats OK
Laundry
Receiving Room
Subway
Valet

Apartment Amenities

Dining Room
Dishwasher
Fireplace
Granite Kitchen
Hardwood
Light
Marble Bath
NO FEE
Private Deck
Renovated
Walk In Closet

Located in the quiet UWS, this newly renovated building has a Concierge, access to a Health Club and Laundry, Valet, and it's NO FEE. It's also surrounded by dozens of excellent restaurants and grocery stores, as well a close access to the 1, C, and B trains.

This long hardwood floored and spacious walk-up 1 Bedroom has a renovated kitchen with new stainless steel appliances, plenty of storage space, and Subway tiled bathroom
